meanings.definition: Skill or ability in outdoor activities.
meanings.sent1: His outdoorsmanships were evident as he effortlessly set up the tent.
meanings.sent2: She admired his outdoorsmanships when he started a fire without matches.
meanings.sent3: His outdoorsmanships shone through when he successfully navigated the forest with a map and compass.
meanings.sent4: Her outdoorsmanships were like a well-oiled machine, always prepared for any outdoor challenge.
meanings.sent5: The scout's outdoorsmanships were so impressive that he could survive in the wilderness for days.

meanings.definition: The practice or art of engaging in outdoor pursuits.
meanings.sent1: Their love for outdoorsmanships led them to explore new hiking trails every weekend.
meanings.sent2: She found solace in the outdoorsmanships of fishing, spending hours by the lake.
meanings.sent3: The family's outdoorsmanships reached new heights when they went camping in the snow.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to outdoorsmanships was unwavering, always seeking new adventures.
meanings.sent5: The camp counselor's outdoorsmanships inspired the children to appreciate nature even more.
